name: Modulation & Demodulation
description: Sub-sector template for modulation/demodulation patents (CPC H04L27*) including QAM, OFDM, and coherent detection.
contextDescription: Modulation and demodulation patents cover signal encoding for transmission. Key areas include QAM (cable, wireless), OFDM (WiFi, LTE, 5G), coherent optical modulation, and carrier recovery. High-value targets include wireless chipset vendors (Qualcomm, Broadcom, MediaTek), optical transceiver vendors, and modem implementers.
scoringGuidance: OFDM patents are in every WiFi and cellular device.
High-order QAM patents enable higher spectral efficiency.
Coherent optical modulation patents target 100G+ transport.
Carrier recovery patents are essential for all coherent systems.

questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the modulation scheme and its applications.

questions.reasoningPrompt: Wireless modulation patents have massive volume.

questions.question: Is this relevant to coherent optical communication (DP-QPSK, DP-16QAM)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Coherent optical is critical for backbone capacity.

questions.question: Does this improve spectral efficiency or bits/Hz?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Spectral efficiency is the key metric for wireless and optical.
